definitions.definition: Unskilled; lacking the degree of ability that would normally be expected.
definitions.example: Having an incompetent lawyer may be grounds for a retrial, but the lawyer in question probably doesn't know that.

definitions.definition: Unable to make rational decisions, insane or otherwise cognitively impaired.
definitions.example: The charged was judged incompetent to stand trial, at least until his medication started working.

definitions.definition: Of the cervix: opening too early in pregnancy, provoking the baby to be born.
Not resistant to deformation or flow.
